modName: Better Soul Cairn Summon Spells - DELETED
summary: Tweaks the Soul Cairn summon spells to level with the player, and makes them more effective overall.
descriptionHtml:
I've always really liked the Conjure Wrathman, Conjure Boneman and Conjure Mistman spells. The problem, however, was Conjure Wrathman seemed to be the only useful one at higher levels. That's why I made this mod. All of these spells now level with the player, and the changes to each specific summons are as follows:

Boneman
=========

*Uses Ebony Bow and Ebony Arrows


Mistman
========
*No longer casts Frostbite or Ice Spike
*Now casts Ice Storm
*Now casts Conjure Frost Atronach
*Increased Magicka pool


Wrathman
==========
*No changes deemed necessary


I also tweaked the Health and Stamina of all of the summons to be more appropriately aligned with the new levels. This is my first mod, and I tried to make things as balanced as possible. I would really appreciate feedback. If something seems too underpowered or too overpowered, please let me know. I'm certainly open to tweaking things. Enjoy!
author: darklord4878
